content: I'm looking for a free open-source query builder for FHIR. I mean a UI through which the end-user can build a query to send to a FHIR server. Is there anything out there already?
I believe the HAPI server and test.fhir.org server's web-based APIs are open-source. I'm not aware of a generic non-web API though.

Lloyd McKenzie said:

I believe the HAPI server and test.fhir.org server's web-based APIs are open-source. I'm not aware of a generic non-web API though.

I mean I need a browser-based open-source tool to just create search queries. Is there any?
